Instructions.Value: The Pike was created at the direction of Magestrix Kyalla Centrella during the later part of the Third Succession War, in an attempt to supply the Great Houses with a vehicle that would decimate each others' BattleMech armies. The Clan version aims to finish the job with the "brrrt" of five UAC/2s. Modestly armored, except frontally. Tracked: High traction, agile turning. Movement: 3/5 Hex: 90/150 Meters. Armor: Standard Structure: Structure Values A S Front 225 30 Left 130 30 Right 130 30 Rear 130 35 Turret 200 30 Total 815 150
